data.content:
verb
-ens; -ened; -ening
smarten up
[phrasal verb]
US
to become more intelligent or aware :to become smarter
He told me to smarten up and pay attention to the teacher.
He'd better smarten up [=wise up] or he'll get fired.
b smarten (someone or something) up or smarten up (someone or something) :to make (someone or something) smarter or more aware
Someone needs to smarten him up before he gets in trouble.
smarten (someone or something) up or smarten up (someone or something) :to make (someone or something) neat and attractive
They smartened [=spruced] themselves up for the party.
They smartened up the room for the party.

Động từ
smarten [oneself; somebody; something] up
làm cho bảnh bao hơn; làm cho gọn ghẽ hơn
you'll have to smarten [yourself] up a bit before going out
cậu phải sửa sang lại cho bảnh hơn trước khi ra ngoài
try to smarten the house up before the visitors arrive
hãy cố sửa soạn nhà cửa cho gọn ghẽ hơn trước khi khách đến
